title: Sex, Love & Robots with David Duncan
itunes:title: Sex, Love & Robots with David Duncan
itunes:subtitle: On today’s show, Emily is joined by best-selling author David Ewing Duncan to talk about this new book, Talking to Robots – and their breaking down the chapters about intimacy & sex! Plus, Emily answers your emails. The two discuss what the...
description:
On today’s show, Emily is joined by best-selling author David Ewing Duncan to talk about this new book, Talking to Robots – and their breaking down the chapters about intimacy & sex! Plus, Emily answers your emails.

The two discuss what the future may hold for sex & intimacy robots (imagine a hologram version of Emily in your bedroom?!). Then, Emily answers questions about what to do when you love going down on your partner, but they’re a little apprehensive, the age old sexual grooming question – to shave or not to shave, and your partner’s pushing for a threesome, but with a full house, it’s the last thing on your mind. 

Thank you for supporting our sponsors who help keep the show FREE: Veritas Farms, Muse, SiriusXM, Womanizer

Follow Emily on all social: @sexwithemily

For more on "Talking to Robots," click HERE.

For even more sex advice, tips & tricks, visit sexwithemily.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
